Text:
Documentary.

A look back at one of the most important current affairs programmes in television history. It includes some fascinating clips, and contributions from its reporters and editors. 
(https://www.itv.com/itvplayer/the-world-in-action-years/series-1/episode-1-the-world-in-action-years)

World in Action is a British investigative current affairs programme made by Granada Television from 1963 until 1998. Its campaigning journalism frequently had a major impact on events of the day. Its production teams often took audacious risks and gained a solid reputation for its often unorthodox, some said left-wing, approach.
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_in_Action)
